titleStmt.title: This court taking into their consideration, that the utmost time appointed for taking down and removing all such sheds, shops, and other like buildings, which have been erected since the late dismal fire ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Hooker, William, Sir, 1612-1697.

notesStmt.note: Title from first five lines of text.
At head of title: Hooker maior. Martis, decimo septimo die Martii, 1673. Annoque regni Regis Caroli Secundi Angliæ, &c. vicesimo sexto.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
